select * from cs_master as cm, cmmn_cd as cmcd, cs_reply as cr where 1=1 and cmcd.cm_cd = 300 and cm.cs_code = cmcd.item_cd and cm.cs_no = #{cs_no} and cr.cs_no = #{cs_no}

mapper.insert: insert into cs_reply(cs_no, csre_con, proc_id) VALUES(#{cs_no}, #{csre_con}, #{proc_id})
